title: The Master's Will (1U215)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Search. Shadow: Spot X Nazgul to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take into your hand all [Wraith] cards revealed and discard the rest.
Lore:	”…something seemed to be compelling him to disregard all warnings, and he longed to yield.”
Rarity:	U
